Detailed Description

Substance current version description structure and accessor function.

Christophe Soum - Allegorithmic (christophe.soum@allegorithmic.com)
Note:
This file is part of the Substance engine headers
Date:
20080610

Defines the SubstanceVersion structure. Filled using the substanceGetCurrentVersion function.
